html:
2025-0857
2025-11-28FINCanadian International Trade Tribunal ActRegulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations Regulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations in order to (1) amend the Regulations to specify aspects of a procurement process that the Canadian International Trade Tribunal is not authorized to inquire into, namely aspects of a procurement process that relates to Canadian suppliers and content or limiting procurements to small businesses; and (2) includes a transitional provision specifying the date after which these amendments would apply to complaints that are filed.Registration: SOR/2025-0247 Publication Date: 2025-12-17
subject: Regulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the Canadian International Trade Tribunal Procurement Inquiry Regulations in order to (1) amend the Regulations to specify aspects of a procurement process that the Canadian International Trade Tribunal is not authorized to inquire into, namely aspects of a procurement process that relates to Canadian suppliers and content or limiting procurements to small businesses; and (2) includes a transitional provision specifying the date after which these amendments would apply to complaints that are filed.
